page.title: 13THE POST OFFICE.
page.content: The Post Office is situated in the middle of Branscombe.It looks like a house from the front. The people that own the Post Office now, used to live in Birmingham.They get about 200 customers a day and their busiest months are June, July and August because of the holiday makers. The shop they owned before they came here was a Hardware shop. The Post Office is about 110 or 120 years old. People collect their pensions and allowances from the Post Office. They also sell daily morning papers and groceries. They have made it alot bigger and they have a little sweet display for children. Mr Poulton the previous owner came from Seaton,but when he owned the Post Officeit did not sell groceries.
